title: Collage
credit_line: Gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
Leon Polk Smith [1906-1996], New York, NY, until December 1961 [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1962 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Payment to the artist was sent on December 20, 1961.
[2]. The collage was purchased for Carnegie Institute by James L. Winokur, Pittsburgh, PA, as a gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur. It was accessioned on February 15, 1962.
